title: Influenza Vaccine Proven Ineffective and Dangerous
cleaned_text:
How are we expected to place our trust in the influenza vaccine when the evidence proves it is ineffective and potentially very harmful?

Proof the Influenza Vaccine is Ineffective and Dangerous

The U.S.S. Ardent recently had an outbreak of the influenza virus, affecting almost a quarter of the crew aboard. What is outrageous about this, is every navy crewman aboard the ship is forced to get a flu shot. 99% of the people on board the U.S.S. Ardent had previously gotten the influenza vaccine, yet the outbreak wasn’t hindered in the slightest.

This goes right up against what the U.S. government has been claiming for years, indisputable proof that the flu vaccine is not nearly as effective as they would have us believe.

Earlier this year, Italy launched an official investigation into the influenza vaccine, after roughly a dozen people died within 48 hours after receiving a flu shot. They immediately issued a warning urging people not to take the vaccine.

Did anything remotely close happen in the United States? Certainly not.

GlaxoSmithKline manufactures the Flulaval vaccine, which was recently tested by Natural News’ own Health Ranger. What he found was an extremely high dose of Mercury. 51ppm to be precise, more than 2,500,000% higher than the maximum contaminant level of inorganic mercury allowed in our drinking water.

The Natural Solution to the Influenza Virus

One natural antioxidant yields a myriad of health benefits, one of which is its ability to inhibit the growth and lifespan of the influenza virus. This antioxidant is N Acetyl-L-Cysteine (NAC) and it is the key to a healthy immune system.

The effects of NAC on the highly pathogenic H5N1 Influenza A Virus show that it not only inhibits the replication of the virus, but also the production of pro-inflammatory molecules. Resulting in less severe flu symptoms and a significantly decreased lifespan of the virus.

N Acetyl-L-Cysteine is known primarily for its ability to enhance the natural production of the body’s master antioxidant; Glutathione. While this is extraordinarily beneficial for our health, well-being and immunity, it is just the tip of the iceberg.

Helping to detoxify the body and chelate harmful heavy metals, NAC can enhance immune function, inhibit the influenza virus and even repair some of the damage done by vaccines containing high mercury levels.

No matter your stance on the vaccination debate, N Acetyl-L-Cysteine is a must.

Author: Jeffrey Sutton contributes to numerous online health sites and publications. Having spent years specializing in natural health supplements with an emphasis on Glutathione, Jeffrey recently formulated the Glutathione enhancing supplement GSH Gold.
